As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions. However, the benefits and risks of hosting the Olympics are complex and can vary from city to city, depending on a range of factors.

On one hand, hosting the Olympics can have significant benefits for a city, such as increased tourism, improved infrastructure, and global visibility. These factors can help attract new businesses, talent, and investment, leading to sustained economic growth in the long run.

On the other hand, there are significant risks associated with hosting the Olympics, including financial burdens, long-term debt, and the displacement of local residents. Furthermore, there are no guarantees that the benefits of hosting the Olympics will be long-lasting or generate enough social and economic positives to offset the hosting costs.

Therefore, it is essential to assess the benefits and risks of hosting the Olympics carefully and on a case-by-case basis. It's also necessary to engage in public consultation and involve local communities in the decision-making process.
